item.description:
Yummy Dinner and a Sexy Movie. Join us for dinner at Le's, after the dinner we will walk over to the movie screening.

Le's is known for their delicious Pho. They've gotten great reviews on Yelp and their prices are pretty reasonable. Check it out at:
http://www.yelp.com/b...


8PM Movie - The People I've Slept With
2009 | 89 mins | Comedy
Harvard University, Science Center C
1 Oxford Street, Cambridge
(T: Harvard Square)

Part of the Boston Asian American Film Festival, the movie is a sex comedy about a promiscuous woman who finds herself with an unplanned pregnancy and needs to figure out who the baby daddy is…NOW.

Angela Yang (Karin Anna Cheung) loves sex. She loves it so much she needs to make baseball cards of her lovers to help her remember whom she slept with. She doesn’t think twice about her lifestyle until she finds out that she’s pregnant.

Beneath the steamy adventures of The People I’ve Slept With lies the touching story of the importance of defining friendship and family for a modern woman who must find the path to accept herself.

Discount on movie ticket if we buy 10 or more at $7.50 each. Must reserve the tickets by Thursday, Nov. 11. Regular price of tix is $10. We will follow up with you regarding purchase of discount tix.

There'll be an after party at the Hong Kong Restaurant at 10:30PM.

RSVP - please indicate if you will be going to dinner, movie or both.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner & Movie (BAAFF)
